content.detailedDescription:
I live in siswa bazar maharajganj (u.P.) india
i am homoeopathic doctor.
i notice like big jet and many stars attached every corner and all boundary line.
i and my sister's son lay on out ta-rise then he saw big space ship.
content.summary: I saw like big ship  but every corner and liner consist stars and black in center.

content.detailedDescription:
Last october ne of brownsville at 1810 hrs. spotted by my son as he was confusing the bright object with the evening star. weather very warm and crystal blue skies. this was in a gated area of forest known as kirk avenue. after i identified direction and noticed that 2 airliners passed underneath this craft, glass was deployed. binoculars could not pull in the object. i retrieved my spotting scope and was able to identify the object as a disc, wobbling in one position. almost right on top of my location. i detected a slight rise on the top of the disc as it wobbled. underside, i noticed a black geometric shape square but not quite square. we observed this craft for up to 6 minutes, maybe longer. i made an attempt to marry a cell phone camera to the spotting scope in that short time span and getting set for a picture the object was gone. the distance from me to the disk had to be at approx. 50k in feet from my position maybe higher. this was my second ufo/ifo event for 2013.  

march 2013, date forgotten, early evening i observed the same type of shining light between my house and the cascades, distance was over 10 miles direction from myself was due ne. weather mixed sun and thunderheads. i noticed the bright shining light. pointed this light to a witness and we watched for about 4-5 minutes. cloud was moving south from the shining object and this object slowly slid into the thunderhead on a straight path of travel. not seen again that day.

may 2013 members of my family out for an evening walk and they noticed 3 red lights and they did record the event. i did review the filming by digital device, cell phone camera. this went on for a shorter period of time that my october sighting. i was advised that the lights were above the peterson butte area west of lebanon. one light zips off and with a quickness and returned to the previous formation.
content.summary: Out hunting last october noticed bright light overhead with commercial craft flying directly below disc/saucer.

content.detailedDescription: While walking on a late summer evening, my wife and i noticed a bright light to the north which i thought was a landing light of an airplane. not a usual flight path for flights from our airport. immediately after noticing the bright yellowish light approaching (going south), my wife noticed two other aerial objects in the north sky. at that time, one of the objects that she pointed out was west of the approaching light. we could tell by the blinking lights that it was a conventional airplane. at about the same distance away (both were behind the glowing object slightly) another steady red light flanked the glowing central light by about the same distance as the airplane.As they approached, they all entered a relatively small cloud bank and emerged much closer together and headed directly above us. as they approached, the center glowing object seemed much more orange colored and very closely flanked by the plane and the other object. as the trio passed over at what i estimate to be about 1500-2500 feet. the center orange light was a spherical shape as it was lit on all sides. the front, bottom and rear were observed by both of us. the airplane was flanking the object very closely and from experience could tell by the sound that it was a military jet fighter escorting the orb. i could see it partially outlined against the sky also. i have not had a chance to mention the other object since we were mostly transfixed on the plane and orb. at a distance the east object appeared as a red light. as it approached and net up with the jet and orb, it appeared to be a bright red cylinder but smaller or about the same size as the jet. all continued south.
content.summary: Glowing orange orb escourted by military jet and red glowing object

content.detailedDescription:
My husband at the time t
asked if i wanted to go for a ride, because i was pregnant at the time and close to give birth so i was not feeling well, so i said ok.. so we got in the vehicle and started to head out to hookers point, when suddenly the radio had a humming sound and could not get a radio station, so i turned it off, just to realize that the sound was comming from the outside and just out of nowhere the car turned off when at the same time i had a telepathic link that made me look upwards when i did you can see the craft right above us and as soon as i said in my brain, what is it?  i had a response that told me it's not important of what it is, but who we are,  i could see that the craft had lights and it was a triangle shape but huege suddenly it cloaked it self as i told it to show me and tell me what they wanted,and i said to it that i was carrying a bby that i cannot go with them at this time the next thing i heard a loaud swish straight up and then just dashed forward and upward and then i heard the loudest boom ever. i never said anything or my husband because we didn't want people to think we were crazy or making it up, so i have kept it a secret sisince, i have visitation s
from time to time, i have not been the same since then, even now i should not have said anything, but ihabe a feeling of not bueno, but let's  see what happens.
content.summary: Of

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the west side of amelia island. i stood on my deck watching an approaching storm from the west. clouds rushed over my house heading east toward the ocean. i suddenly noticed one small cloud hanging below the large ones and hanging back. not going fast at all. i thought that was odd. 

so, i kept watching it until it reached the intracoastal waterway at which time it made a turn to the north (left). that got my attention and i ran down to the marsh edge and watched as long as i could. the little cloud was heading north as all the other clouds were still heading west. about the time the cloud should have reached kings bay submarine base in ga, it made another left, over the base and heading west once again. i watched it until other clouds covered it. 

i didn't know who to call. i only knew that i looked in the skies for over thirty years hoping to see some evidence of a ufo. instead, when i least expect it, i see a little cloud acting against the norm of the weather. no lights, no silver disc, no aliens. just a little cloud making sharp turns. i'm glad, however, that i saw something unusual. 

i hope to see another one day. i hope you are able to determine if these creatures are peaceful or not.
content.summary: Small cloud under higher storm clouds. made a left toward kings bay. got there and made another left over it.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok here is the ufo video taken april 25, 2014 at 7:25 pm driving southbound on hwy 49 between belton and peculiar missouri. terry e yoder was videoing from his cell phone. i was driving 65 mph trying to see out the window to the west. cameron, chad and caden (underage boys)  are in the back seat. you can hear us being totally overwhelmed by the sight. 

terry noticed out the window to the west. at first he was trying to point as he didn't want to scare the boys. we are saw the flashing and strobes. i was aware of the strobe in my peripheral vision before i knew what was happening. he wanted to pull over but i was driving with other traffic in a south bound lane and didn't feel it was safe. i said, use your video on cell phone. (samsung galley 4 phone -- terrible camera). 

we knew immediately it was not a 'natural' event, not a plane and the sun was to the north of the lights. it was shrouded in clouds the entire time and we only saw strobing.  we were all highly excited and incredulous. you can hear all our exclamations on the video. one of the boys was very frightened. 

it seemed to hover at first and then seemed to suddenly start tracking with us. one of the boys noticed a red mist to what seemed to be behind it. 

it seemed to gain speed as the flashes were all around, then they seem to become circular and faster. i feel very certain it was extraterrestrial in nature. i've not seen a plane send out those types of flashes. 

i saw an orb just 6 weeks ago in a near by city. i posted it the next day on facebook and posted this report and video on facebook last night. 

 i've  had an experience driving through az and landed in roswell, nm and lost time. that's a different story but as reference to the fact this is not a new subject for me. 

i don't believe my husband has seen anything like this and the boys are 12 to 15 and definitely their first experience. 

in the video there appears to an 'orb' and/or rectangular object behind or inside the cloud. it started with flashes of light that were like a strobe light. literally even from the side view the strobe was so bright it felt like it was going to cause a seizure. at the end when we loose sight we'd turned off the highway and pulled into the post office. one of the boys said he saw a rectangle dropped down below the horizon when we turned. this is untouched raw video. 

i have video but i am not prepared to hand over complete rights to my video and certainly not going to allow you to sight unseen decide what is done with this video. are you a fact finding organization or are you look for free press?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing lights changing to strobe flashes continued approx 9 mins

content.detailedDescription:
I cannot vouch for the timeline in this event because too many years have passed so particular times have been forgotten.

i was stationed at malmstrom afb from july 1967 to feb 1968. my duty station was at a missile command site where i was the senior nco.
the duty hours were 12 on and 12 off.
one night out of sheer boredom i decided to lay down in the bed of our site pickup just to watch the stars.
after watching for a while i noticed a starlike object move from one starlike object to another starlike object. after a short period of time i saw the original starlike object move back to the first starlike object. i watched this activity go on for approx, 1 hour.
my first thought was it appeared to be like a timed shuttle service.
i did not mention this event to anyone as i was due for discharge shortly 
and didn't want anything to interfer with that.

obviously i'm sure the reaction to this story is that iwas asleep and dreamt the event.  i can state absolutely there was no chance i was sleeping. the only person i ever related this event to was my wife.

one other thing i've always thought strange was that i did not hear one word about the ufo incident at malmstrom in march of '67 while i was there and did not even learn about it until i saw a story concerning it on tv several years later
content.summary: Strange movement of stars

content.detailedDescription:
This occurred more than thirty years ago, but a hanger 1 episode that i watched was similar enough to inspire me to send this.

  at the time this occurred i and my family lived in a very old farm house (built pre-civil war)directly across from huron county landfill. the house did not have air conditioning, and i had screens in the bedroom windows.    
  my wife at that time (ex-wife now)worked at a fast food place that had late night drive through and she was not home when i experienced the ufo. i have two sons who have been 3 years old and nearly 5 years old at that time.  we had a dog at that time, ruffy, kind of a black lab mix mutt, that was not confined. 
  the bedroom i was asleep in was on the first floor. i was awakened by ruffy persistently growling outside close to the bedroom window. eventually, i got up and went outside to see what the heck she was growling at.  we lived on the north side of townline 131, and the landfill was directly across from us on the south side of the road.
  the house only had 1 door, and that was near the back of the house, so when i went outside i would be approaching ruffy's position from behind her.  i remember walking up to her and quietly saying something like "what you growling at girl?" i remember getting a tail wag as an acknowledgement, but her focus was still toward the landfill. at this point, we were at the southeast corner of the house.
  i walked on out into the front yard, but ruffy would not come with me.  she remained at the southeast corner of the house. i stared into the landfill for a while, but i didn't hear or see a thing (i can't remember if it was a moonless night, or overcast, but it was pretty dark).  i finally decided she must be growling at a deer or something and turned to go back into the house. it was at that point that i heard the roar.
  i turned back toward the landfill and there right in front of me was an object.  it was dark enough that i could not make out an actual shape, but there were three distinct lights.
  the property (i still own it) has a frontage of about 150 feet.  the two red lights were somewhat farther apart then that, with the white light centered between the red ones but about 50 feet or so higher in the air.
  i would estimate the red lights to be about 80 feet off the ground...Just above treetop level.  i was probably no more then 300 feet away.
  the roar did not continue, and the object just moved away south until i could no longer see it.
  that was all that i saw and experienced. we used to have military planes out of...Perrysburg, i think...That would fly over the area from time to time, and i think i might have chalked up what i saw to one of those if it wasn't for subsequent events.
  the next night, my ex-wife was again working the late shift.  when she arrived home the object was hovering over the area between where our house is and where the landfill office/weigh scale is located. to my knowledge, to this day she won't talk about it.  my youngest son (now 34) said he asked her about it once and she just said "i don't want to talk about it".
  the same week, maybe two day later, the youngest son (about 3 and a half years old at the time) was talking about a face looking in their bedroom window. i remember logging it in my mind at the time because of when he mentioned it, and the closeness in time to my and my ex-wife's ufo experiences. 
  and now there is more to add.  yesterday (4/26/2014) my youngest son and i were driving to the columbus airport to pick up his older brother who was returning from japan, and i brought up the hanger 1 series and how something i saw on it was eerily similar to what i had experienced, and i wondered if he remembered...
  at that point he interrupted me and said "the face in the window! i sure do, it's as clear in my mind as if it was yesterday." he then went on to describe what he saw.  he said it was brown and looked like a mummy face...Like a mummy looks like when you remove the coverings.
  as we drove and talked, we both wondered if wayne (his older brother) had ever experienced anything. after we picked him up at the airport and were on our way back, we related to him what we had been discussing.
  wayne too had had an 'event' that was clear in his mind.  he said that he just thought it was a very vivid dream...But he swears there was a time that he thought there was something in their room (an apelike creature), and that it took craig and went out the window then jumped over the landfill fence.
  again...Maybe just a dream, but i have one more thing to add. when the kids were young they were notorious for not going to sleep when they were supposed to.  they were supposed to be in bed one night, and i was still awake downstairs when i heard footsteps upstairs. i remember thinking to myself "are those dang kids still up?". so i quietly went up the stairs so i could catch them and give them heck.  when i got upstairs they were sound asleep in their beds. my grandmother said it was probably squirrels, but darn it, i know what squirrels sound like when they are in a house and what i heard was. not. squirrels. i also cannot recall when this occurred in relation to the other events that i've put down. i don't know if it was before or after. i don't think it was too close to the same time because i didn't associate it with the ufo, and it was only wayne telling me about his "vivid memory" that made me wonder.

   that's pretty much it.  i don't think there is much of anything to investigate.  the house burned down some years back, and i rent the property out now to a guy who has a trailer on it.  the landfill is still there, but operates as a transfer station now.

   i see the next question on this form is number of witnesses.  i am going to just put 1, because i was by myself when i experienced it. but did it subsequently become 2 or 3 or 4? i don't know and i probably never will.
content.summary: Triangular craft witnessed and unsettling experiences by muliple family members

content.detailedDescription:
Orb of yellow light: ~1970's hovering near saddleback ridge sw sky ~9pm. bright yellow orb object hovering near saddleback ridge in the sw sky ~ 9pm. moved left & right, up & down, hovering, no sound. 
1.) i was outside walking around my home at night, happened to look toward saddleback ridge & saw this huge round yellow hovering orb.
2.) the orb was just there. 
3.) "what is this/why?" 
4.) noticed it was hovering, no sound, then it started the quick movements. 5.) scared, i shouldn't be seeing this & i don't want to know more- i took off running as fast as i could toward the building where my family was. never told anyone about this until over 40 years later to my son who seems to be interested in this subject matter. never saw anything like that since. 6.) i left the area so i don't know what happened to that orb.
content.summary: Orb of  yellow light: ~1970's hovering near saddleback ridge sw sky ~9pm

content.detailedDescription:
My "story" is a book. strange things began to happen around us, especially after october 6, 2013- when our (my) lives changed. prior to that date, i was a die-hard skeptic, i will admit. however, this isn't about all of that. it's about this 1 event.

due to strange happenings, we installed outdoor night vision surveillance cameras. one points south, down middle of our horse barn. other points north, toward the street. i haven't paid much attention to the monitor screen which sits in our kitchen when friday, april 18, after putting my daughter to bed, i walked past the camera monitor & something caught my eye. i stopped to look and first saw a large, white "thing"- hovering above the ground in our yard. sort of like a flag pole with a flag but upside down. first i thought maybe a trash bag was blowing around. then i realized the wind isn't blowing hard enough for that to occur plus it was hovering, blowing around in 1 spot. as i stared it flew up in air, over my horse trailer and down toward ground and out of view. i sat there a minute, trying to digest when i saw a thin light beam bouncing around the horse trailer. it then went above horse trailer, twirled around a bit, then back down. it was moving all around the trailer but only in camera view if that makes sense. suddenly, 2 perfectly round white lights came into camera view in sky above trailer. one was just above the other. then, they parted ways, each going in a different direction (east and west). they came back together and danced around a bit. i could clearly see that the beam was coming from 1 of those lights. the beam, by the way, wasn't solid. it was solid then skipped some space then solid- so forth. it was perfectly straight, like a pole yet had some dead space here and there. i quickly took out my cell phone and began to video the monitor. then i stopped taking video to go outside and see what it was. there was nothing there! i ran back inside and it was still visible on monitor. i record again. i go back outside- nothing there. i go back in and it's gone.

this may sound like nothing to you, but with all i've been through & experienced lately, it was extremely upsetting to me. i filed a report with the national ufo reporting center in wa. that guy was extremely rude and inappropriate. i know what i'm seeing, feeling, hearing, sensing, dreaming & catching on video & photo. i see it, hear it, feel it, & to be honest, communicate with it. i am a contributing member of society. i work hard every day. i'm raising 3 children and am a good mom. we own 2 homes and i run 2 businesses- 1 being a nonprofit. i'm college educated. the way i was treated by the national center is absolutely ridiculous. i have a heck of a story over the past few months. thank goodness i have the photos and video to prove it. i used to think people involved in this stuff had to be weird. i guess the jokes on me. that's ok though. i am on a mission to figure all this out- to get answers. i'm not looking for attention by any means. i have plenty already. more than i want to put it blunt. i just want to understand what's going on without my or my family name being plastered everywhere. 

i apologize for going off on a tangent. it's been tough. we've been frightened and frustrated and tired of getting the runaround because no one wants to think what i have is real. i welcome any professional to test our photos or video. i can assure you it hasn't been tampered with.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 lights in sky on outdoor surveillance cameras. large white amoeba shape hovering over ground by house that flew off. beam from 1 light that moved around. 2-3 other lights in background closer to ground in & out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cigarette, on april 24, 2014 time was about 7:30-8:00pm at night it was still light outside so the sky was still light clear blue and all you could see is the blue sky. i felt this strange sensation of looking up into the sky and in the meantime i observed this really bright object that seemed very out of place since im very familiar with the sky and star location it seemed a bit odd but as i was about to come in i noticed a lot of little small like flashing orbs ejecting or coming in to close range of that brighter object, so i if that was not strange enough lots of more orbs coming in from the se direction started coming in to close range of this much bigger object.
so of course ran in grabbed my binoculars and camera trying to see what was this strange object ejecting little like bright orbs that were fling in all sorts of direction with no path, some stopping and hovering and some cont. in a path but dimming the lights and some turning off completely so this was weird since i know of no aircraft to do such thing never the less moving very oddly stopping making sharp turns and like if waiting for a sigh from some other object. i really got scared when i started taking pictures this intelligent objects moved in for a closer look especially the big bright one and dimming its lights while it came in for closer observation of what it might be. i since that night have felt as if i'm being watched or observer or could just be plain paranoia i cant explain it. on 4-23-14 at around 4:15 4:30am i looked outside my bedroom window and to my right and there was a cigar shaped object just in mid air i say like about 10-15 feet off the ground, then my husband had got up to use the restroom and in coming back into the room he turns on light and the cigar shaped object disappears without noise. 
the next day i went out about the same time i have noticed this objects
and the same thing happens little bright orbs coming out of underneath this big bright like object and going in different path or directions and some hovering. 
it was until this morning about like 3:30 4:am i started having the same sensation that something was like hovering up close by my house and sure enough take a look out the living room window and this big bight object since i turned the lights off to go to bed started decending form the sky like a leaf falling to ground and dimming its lights as it did this, so i quickly run and turn the lights on this object starting going back up but still with the light dimmed. i also observed another object a lot higher than the brighter one side with this object i feel like its one craft object but transparent to a point to look like a star and confuse the public but as i said its very weird its been like 2 weeks and this intelligent objects moving in odd and stopping and hovering for long periods of time are cont. to appear. 

all i want is for someone with the experience in this area to please have someone come out and take a look at this very highly active area of unknown flying objects that are scaring me. as for my family thinks im going in sane. im sending what i have captured but would like to remain anonymous please.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Intelligent objects they react to flash & disk like objects, triangle like shaped objects along with diffrent size orbs

content.detailedDescription: On april 16th 2014 i was going down 422 on my way to my sisters house but i notice in the sky all these things flying around really fast and really close together they didn't appear to be planes or anything else i was driving i was trying to wait for the truck to move i took two pictures while i was driving when i enlarge the picture i can see that they were round objects with lights
content.summary: Around with the windows

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the front yard in about 5:35 8/2/13 and it had just gotten dark and i noticed that a small slow moving object was traveling across the sky it didn't appear like any aircraft that i could identify so i figured i would take a picture and then see if there is any internet traffic that stated that other people had seen the same craft.  the craft was an oval or disc shaped made no sound traveled extremely slowly and in a straight-line path it was far away and my picture isn't very good. it appears very small and is located just over the power lines in the center of the picture
content.summary: Slow moving disk or oval shape.  traveled straight line.  no sound no lights.   far away

content.detailedDescription:
Location: at residence with business near shirley, tx community.
i was outside talking with my supervisor about the next days work when he, out of the blue, ask me if i believed in alien civilizations.  i said i would hate to think humans were the only advanced beings in the universe. my boss said to me then turn around. so i did.  i saw a blue/green sphere about 30 feet in diameter approaching from the south.  as it neared the two of us it seemed that it was going to land as it was just above tree level and about 60 feet from us.  then it turned its trajectory and traveled to the northwest over a neighbors house and out of view.  i think my boss had his .44 magnum on his hip and i do not know to this day if the object could sense that.  about 30 miles west of our location is a military/corporate airstrip with lots of "secret" projects.  i know from friends that air force one is maintained at this location.  i also worked at that location for 6 months in 1991 as an air conditioning installer. there are about 5,000 military/civilian workers at that location in greenville, tx.

i made a 5 minute account of incidence on art bell's "dreamland" in about the year 2000.  i still would like to know what i saw that day.
content.summary: Terqoise sphere hovered on north path towards us and then turned to northwest

content.detailedDescription:
About three years ago, i was flying a kite, at about 5 pm in august on a clear sky day. the kite was diamond shape, with the with about 6 feet. the string was exactly 500 ft long and i had it at full length extended. all of a sudden a charcoal color orb appeared to the right of the kite. i estimated the diameter of the orb at about 2 feet and it floated at about six feet to the right of the kite. 

as i was in the middle of a soccer field, across from my home, i decided to slowly walk back toward my home, as the garage door was open and i knew exactly where the binoculars were located. as i started to back up the orb remained in the same location as i started to pull the kite back toward my home which was at a distance of over a football field away. 

i kept my eyes on the orb and realized it was not a balloon or any other recognizable object. in fact the orb was very shiny, perfectly round and it appeared to shimmer on its perimeter all the way around. there was no noise or increase or decrease of distance between the orb and my kite. i must have the orb in view for over ten minutes. 

as i approached my garage, i stopped and looked again at the orb, it was still there; then i quickly went inside the garage, grabbed my binoculars as i held on to the string. when i came our of the garage, and looked at the kite, the orb was gone. i repeated the event the next and and a few days later, but nothing like this happened again.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: At the time of my sightings, i am at work, taking a smoke break before we open at 5a.M., and what made me notice the object is the height right over trees and parking lot full of light parking lamps that i face an look out towards every morning. i am a u.F.O. believer since i was a child so, seeing this really puts many questions of the realistic sights at my age. before sunrise, the object is in the same area, but higher and higher every time i come out to observe into the morning at least a hour after, and u can see it until its a dot of light away. now as i get to work before going in, it is not in the location, but at 4:50 am, its there, bright and since i have started taking pictures, i seeing different objects other than the orb i witness with the naked eye, to lead me to know something is really out there and has confirmed to me u.F.Os are indeed real, because theirs no blinking lights of airplane or helicopter on the craft or objects i am seeing. it is not stars because as the sun comes up it is in the same location, but gets higher as time goes by. science was a study that i learned very well in high school, advance courses so i do understand why i am indeed right about my sightings, thanks for viewing my report.
content.summary: Bright light orb thats in the same spot , upward as sun rise mornings i work.

content.detailedDescription:
In the early morning hours of april 24th 2014. a u.F.O shaped like a disk landed on my property. i went out to investigate the occurrence following a disturbance in my cell phone service. the craft proceeded to open up from at hatch at the top and a robotic life form proceeded to come from the top of said craft. he identified himself as kelar igus, and requested my assistance before collapsing in my yard. 

i have his body in my garage under 24/7 audio/visual observation.  i request your organizations assistance with this situation. please do not inform the government of this.
content.summary: A disk shaped craft landed on my  property and a robotic. life form proceeded to ask for my help.

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping near a river going towards virginia beach, the campsite was near the rivers edge. i look over the water towards the east and saw a bright light in the sky. the light moved to my left, which would be north.
it was less than 1 second. then moved back again to point of origin on the east side of the river. then hovered for a few seconds at its original location, then it moved back towards the north and made a sharp left turn and hovered over the highway. the highway was towards virginia beach.
i drove to the location of where it was hovering over the highway. i parked on the shoulder and tried to flash lights at it ( no response )
then i tried the am/fm radio i did receive radio stations, but was not able to hear and abnormalities on the radio.

the date and time of the incident is hard for me to pin down exactly.
i believe it was in the late 70's at night during the fall summer or spring, definitely not in the winter, between 9:00pm and 11:00pm.
the light was on the east side of the river, moving back and forth in less than a second with no sound.
then it crossed the river and stood stationary over the highway close to the campgrounds.

i do not know the size because i was not sure of the distance from me.
the light from it was stable and did not flash or blink, the light was white, to my eyes.
the size of the light i would suggest was aprox. 300 feet in diameter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light in sky, moved north in less than 1 sec. then turned right angle, then above me. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: The sighting occurred during a late night dog walk at 1 am along my road.  it is customary for me to look at the stars; i try and pick out the constellations that i know and watch for the aircraft going over.  (i live under the flightpath of airplanes between chicago o'hare and detroit metro airport.). this object was not in that flightpath, it was northwest and probably about thousand feet up (it wasn't low but it wasn't real high either) and i would estimate about 10 to 15 miles to my northwest.  it was noticeable because there was a row of lights on the edge of it in that  a row of lights is not a typical night sky appearances.  i kept looking at it trying to figure out what it was but i have never seen anything like it before.  it was unusual because it was circular, had a role of lights (or windows) on the edge and it wasn't moving.  there was no noise.  once i figured out it might be a ufo i hurried the dogs along to get back to the house.  as far as i know the object never moved;  a row of pine trees blocked my view the closer to the house we got.  nothing else unusual happened.  i was a little bit scared  of it and it may sound strange but i kept telling it to just stay over there,  don't come near me. i don't care if you are there but i want no part of you.  i could make a sketch of what i saw if you're interested.
content.summary: Saw disc like object hovering nw of my location.  it remained stationary, looked dark with row of lights on edge. lasted about 10 min until i went back in house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my home.Suddenly i saw bright object with different beaming lights.I immediately thought it was an airplane.But the object didn't move at all.Then i thought it was a star, and still it was strange , because it beamed 3-4 different lights constantly.It was bright. after 3-4 min ( i don't know exactly) it just disappeared.
 i'm watching the area ,where the object was ,but nothing is there now.
i'm so so so so so sorry i didn't have the chance to photo it ( i don't have a camera). think what you want , but for me it was undentified flying object!
i was stunned and my heartbeat was faster than usual.
sorry for bad english , i'm from bulgaria.
content.summary: It beamed red,yellow and blue on and on.It stayed still for 3-4 min. and just dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking my dog on a clear day. i noticed a object moving in the sky from west to east. unfortunally i did not take any pictures of that. the object later come back from east heading west. i did take pictures of the object when it was heading back west. i used my iphone 4s to take both pictures and video. exact gps coordinates should be imbedded in the files.

i have repported it to "ufo sverige" in januari 2014, but have still not got a respons from them yet:(
content.summary: Small object seen in the sky. first heading east then heading west

content.detailedDescription: Military helicopter pursuing dimming orb like craft
content.summary: Dark military helicopter ..Pursuing orb like light in sky...Saw  silloette of large airplane above both on the clouds..Orb did not make any noise..And slowly went dark and bright

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend, 15 year old daughter and myself were heading north bound on ironwood to the 60 freeway from our home in queen creek. we were on our way to flagstaff and sedona talking about all the things to do. something had caught my eye at my 1 o'clock, when i looked up i saw a giant x with one large white dome looking light coming from the center and small red lights going down each part of the four wings. it was less than 300 feet from is and moving very slow, maybe 10mph. i yelled wtf is that!!! and started slowing the car, it was massive in size, about 100 yards from corner to corner, enough to block out light. we watched for about 3-4 minutes before it accelerated, turned vertical and split into 4 different pieces that took a linear formation in the sky. when we got on the 60 west freeway, we saw another hovering above a residential area parallel to the freeway, cars were pulled over observing it, i was going about 30 mph an hour in the fast lane while my daughter was trying to get a picture. the craft accelerated fast and disappeared in seconds heading the south east direction. lastly, miles later, we observed another fly above us. still low an altitude, moving very quickly back towards the direction of the last one. all 3 were identical, all x shaped and clearly visible.
content.summary: X shaped ufo's over east valley phoenix very low!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I observe and scrutinise the night sky almost obsessively. on the 23/24 april 2014 we had clear and crisp conditions and the milky way was as clear as it can be in a suburban area in johannesburg, south africa. at around 21h00 i observed an object appear very suddenly (almost as if ejected)from the general area of the belt of orion (orion being more or less directly above). it's triangular / v shape was apparent only due to the thin v-shaped whisps of cloud engulfing it's "flanks". the "inside borders" of the clouds were straight and clearly defined. the "craft" appeared to be quite low and sped directly across the sky, disappearing behind the tree line in my garden in a northerly direction. it's altitude, speed and direction were constant. there was absolutely no sound. we often see odd "behaviour" at night, but this particular sighting had me in a state. my mom was walking the dog and i know she saw it too. she was initially very distressed and now refuses to discuss it. i went outside again an hour or so later and looked up to see the exact same occurence, as if the "video" had been looped. within seconds thereafter, a solid triangular  craft with light blue lights on each corner appeared from the same area and followed the same flight path. this craft was very different to the first 2. it was very clearly defined and obviously solid, flew at a much higher altitude and seemed to be somewhat faster than the first lot.I have seen this craft before on a cloudy night (about 2 months ago). two things i feel are noteworthy: - 1. after each of the 3 craft flew over, an aeroplane happened to fly over and 2. a dark helicopter with searchlights circled the sky above.
in closing, i have thus far never bothered posting any of the numerous sightings i've experienced, but i feel it is high time we south africans start talking about and sharing these experiences. i am convinced that reporting such events will greatly contribute towards a growing movement of consciousness and awakening!
content.summary: 2 massive dark triangle shape flying objects with jagged cloud like outline low flying and smaller triangular aircraft with light blue lights on wings

content.detailedDescription: We seen something almost like an acorn outside above the telephone pole ,at that time i thought it was just me and my mother there, but after years went by i told my sister , she said she was there and so was my brother , we never spoke about this till we were in our 40s ,and our story's are just a little different , but overall the same. well after watching it there , my mother called the pittsburgh air force base and reported it, they told her that a piper cub would come check it out then if it was something the jets would come , next thing you no a small plane came flew around it then went back to the airport ,not even 10 mins went by and here came two jets , that's when the object was gone, my sister said the object went straight up , i didn't see it disappear , i was watching the jets , then my mom called the air force base to see what it was , and they said we never called and they didn't no anything about it !! i never talked about it cause i thought it was a dream till one day we were talking about dreams we had and i told my dream that was not a dream i guess , i remember it as it was yesterday in the air ,our stories differ , like my sister said the piper cub came second the jets were first , that don't seem rt , but who knows the details are foggy all these years later i was about seven and i'm 47 now my sister is 3 years older then me, my brother would not talk about it he's 6 years older then me , but he said he was there, love to no if there was other people there that seen it in the seventies , haven't seen anything since , well that's my story love to hear from somebody! oh ya this happened by the pittsburgh pa airport .
content.summary: Hovering outside above the telephone pole , called air force , plane came object took off , called airfare , said we never called

content.detailedDescription:
location coordinates:  40������ 39�����04������n   73������ 31�����30������w

sunday, april 27, 2014:   approx 8 am.

conditions:  perfect blue sky 48 degrees, wind n,ne 8 mph

while walking the dog, i spotted an anomaly, octahedronal in shape; as big as a house.  it appeared to have something smaller (circling it?) it was moving north > south, was about 250-300 feet in elevation. 

then turned south southwest and began climbing rapidly toward open water.

the permissable floor for aircraft in the area is 1,200 feet

unfortunately, no other witness. i did not have a phone to take images.
content.summary: See below:

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to let my dog out to go to the bathroom. it was very windy outside 30mph winds along with thunder and looked like lightning, there was a big flash but never anything after the flash. i sat down on my front steps and was looking at the sky to the west, then looking northwest. then seen lightning and when it flashed i seen the object. i first thought it was just a helicopter from a distance. then i sat there and my dog started to growl at something west of where i was sitting. towards the neighbors back yard. then i stood up to see if i could see whatever it was. did not see anything. thought maybe it was a deer cause i live in the country.

well i sat back down and lit up a cigarette, then i looked to the northwest and there it was, i was like wow what in the heck is that! note there was no one around all were sleeping, just hear the wind and flash of lightning bolts. anyways it hovered in 1 spot about 1 mile or so; then it started to float alone going south, was barely moving along like it seemed, then after 8 minutes it was out of site over someone corn field, i was gonna get in my truck and follow it but didnt kinda had the willys.  it was big enough to see that is was not no airplane, no heli, was nothing of this world. it did not look like anything i have ever seen. 

as for my feelings i started to shiver and felt weird like ok i am not alone out here lol i better get back inside and lock my doors. kinda freaky.
content.summary: Large ship like cant exolain it

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were sitting on the patio on the south side of our home when we observed an amber colored round object that appeared to our nw (emerging from the west side of our house). object moved slowly (approx. 30 mph) from our right front to our left front (towards the se),dis-appearing behind the trees to the south.  object made no sound.  we observed two white strobe lights at high altitude in the same area. those strobe lights were from aircraft that commonly fly over this area.  the object passed below both of the strobe lights.  we could see the object below and in front of the higher flying aircraft. the altitude of the aircraft was between 1000 and 3000 feet.  the object was approx. "pea-sized".
content.summary: Amber colored round object was observed moving from the nw towards the sse and disappeared behind trees

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pictures of farm equipment at a soon to be auction site. i was taking pics of the sky with clouds and sun and seen what looked to be a fairly large sphere and it was descending so fast i was only able to get 2 pics of the object out of the 3 taken before it disappeared like it went straight into a hole in the ground! it was fast and i think it was reflecting sunlight or mimicing it. i don't know for sure what it was,but i know it ess faster and brighter than anything man made. the pics were taken off an htc evo 4g ltd smartphone 8mp camera. hope this helps and thanks for listening. michael.
content.summary: Fast desending sphere

content.detailedDescription: At about midnight on 4/24/14 my wife and i were dropping a couple friends off in shelbyville. they were walking to there car when one of them noticed what they thought was a falling star but quickly realized it was not. i immediately got out to look and saw what appeared to be a boomerang or triangular shaped object which had a very dull glow and almost seemed as if it were transparent. it was traveling at a very high rate of speed and was absolutely silent.  anything that large and moving at that rate of speed should have made some sort of sound. it only took about 15 seconds to cross the sky. it was first noticed about 35 to 45 degrees above the sw horizon and went out of site about 20 to 30 degrees above the ne horizon. we all got a very good look at the object and none of us could recognize it as being anything we had seen before.
content.summary: Dull, glowing, seemed almost transparent, boomerang or triangle shape moving very fast
